CustomFieldTranslation.name: UseFiscalYearForRecurringDonationValue__c
CustomFieldTranslation.help: When checked, this option enables fiscal year for Recurring Donation value totals. To set the fiscal year start month, go to Setup | Company Settings | Fiscal Year. NOTE: Use Standard Fiscal Year only. Do not enable Custom Fiscal Year.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: Use Fiscal Year for Recurring Donations
